refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the default client character set

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Object oriented style (method):
boolmysqli::set_charset stringcharset
Procedural style:
boolmysqli_set_charset mysqlilink stringcharset
Sets the default character set to be used when sending data from and to the database server.
